title: In Other News: Ex-NSA Employee Spying for Russia, EU Threat Landscape, Cyber Education Funding
description:
Noteworthy stories that might have slipped under the radar: Ex-NSA employee spying for Russia, EU threat landscape report, cyber education funding

title: Advanced ‘StripedFly’ Malware With 1 Million Infections Shows Similarities to NSA-Linked Tools
description:
The StripedFly malware has APT-like capabilities, but remained unnoticed for five years, posing as a cryptocurrency miner.

The post Advanced ‘StripedFly’ Malware With 1 Million Infections Shows Similarities to NSA-Linked Tools appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: F5 Warns of Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability in BIG-IP
description:
A critical-severity vulnerability in F5 BIG-IP CVE-2023-46747 allows unauthenticated attackers to execute code remotely.

The post F5 Warns of Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability in BIG-IP appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: UN Chief Appoints 39-Member Panel to Advise on International Governance of Artificial Intelligence
description:
U.N. Secretary-General António Guterres assembled a global advisory panel to report on international governance of artificial intelligence and its risks, challenges and key opportunities.

The post UN Chief Appoints 39-Member Panel to Advise on International Governance of Artificial Intelligence appeared first on SecurityWeek.
